message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,000,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900,000. I hope this aligns better with what you're considering.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the value of this product is truly exceptional.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $975,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to meet somewhere in between our offers. My counteroffer is $950,000. I hope this proposal is more acceptable.
